author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Backport the fix of a check on the geometry in RPCConeBuilder due to elfontan in #36803

#### PR validation:

The fix to be merged to the master is tested for the trigger code

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of PR #36803
title: ED_RPConeBuilderFix222 Backport the fix of a check on the geometry in RPCConeBuilder due to elfontan in #36803
